opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: American Chicle Co. v. State Tax Commission of New York

opinion:
368 U.S. 17

82 S.Ct. 136

7 L.Ed.2d 85

AMERICAN CHICLE CO.
v.
STATE TAX COMMISSION OF NEW YORK.

No. 301.

Supreme Court of the United States

October 23, 1961

Leo A. Diamond, for appellant.

Louis J. Lefkowitz, Atty. Gen. of New York, Paxton Blair, Sol. Gen., and Robert W. Bush, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellee.

PER CURIAM.

1

The motion to dismiss is granted and the appeal is dismissed for want of a substantial federal question.
